TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SslStream extends System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 提供用於用戶端與伺服器通訊的資料流，其會使用安全通訊端層 (SSL) 安全性通訊協定來驗證伺服器及用戶端 (選擇性)。

span.span: Provides a stream used for client-server communication that uses the Secure Socket Layer (SSL) security protocol to authenticate the server and optionally the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SSL 通訊協定協助提供機密性和完整性檢查的訊息傳輸使用。SSL protocols help to provide confidentiality and integrity checking for messages transmitted using an . SSL 連接，例如提供的，應該進行時，使用通訊用戶端與伺服器之間的機密資訊。An SSL connection, such as that provided by , should be used when communicating sensitive information between a client and a server. 使用可協助防止任何人讀取和竄改時它是在網路上傳輸的資訊。Using an helps to prevent anyone from reading and tampering with information while it is in transit on the network. 執行個體使用的資料流建立時所提供的資料傳輸。An instance transmits data using a stream that you supply when creating the . 當您提供此基礎資料流時，您可以指定是否關閉也會關閉基礎資料流。When you supply this underlying stream, you have the option to specify whether closing the also closes the underlying stream. 一般而言，類別會搭配和類別。Typically, the class is used with the and classes. 方法提供適合搭配類別。The method provides a suitable for use with the class. 在建立之後，必須驗證伺服器和 （選擇性） 用戶端。After creating an , the server and optionally, the client must be authenticated. 伺服器必須提供 X509 憑證，會建立其識別身分的證明，並可以要求的用戶端也會如此。The server must provide an X509 certificate that establishes proof of its identity and can request that the client also do so. 必須執行驗證，再傳輸資訊使用。Authentication must be performed before transmitting information using an . 用戶端會起始驗證使用同步方法會封鎖，直到完成驗證，或非同步方法，不會封鎖等候完成驗證。Clients initiate authentication using the synchronous methods, which block until the authentication completes, or the asynchronous methods, which do not block waiting for the authentication to complete. 伺服器會起始驗證使用同步或非同步方法。Servers initiate authentication using the synchronous or asynchronous methods. 用戶端和伺服器都必須初始化驗證。Both client and server must initiate the authentication. 驗證是由安全性支援提供者 (SSPI) 通道提供者處理。The authentication is handled by the Security Support Provider (SSPI) channel provider. 用戶端被賦予控制藉由指定之伺服器的憑證驗證的機會委派建立時。The client is given an opportunity to control validation of the server's certificate by specifying a delegate when creating an . 伺服器也可以藉由提供控制驗證委派。The server can also control validation by supplying a delegate. 委派所參考的方法包括遠端合作對象憑證和 SSPI 驗證憑證時所發生的任何錯誤。The method referenced by the delegate includes the remote party's certificate and any errors SSPI encountered while validating the certificate. 請注意，是否伺服器指定委派，委派的方法會叫用不論伺服器要求用戶端驗證。Note that if the server specifies a delegate, the delegate's method is invoked regardless of whether the server requested client authentication. 如果伺服器未要求用戶端驗證，伺服器的委派方法，會收到 null 憑證及憑證錯誤的空陣列。If the server did not request client authentication, the server's delegate method receives a null certificate and an empty array of certificate errors. 如果伺服器需要用戶端驗證，用戶端必須指定一個或多個憑證進行驗證。If the server requires client authentication, the client must specify one or more certificates for authentication. 如果用戶端有一個以上的憑證，可以提供用戶端選取正確的憑證伺服器的委派。If the client has more than one certificate, the client can provide a delegate to select the correct certificate for the server. 用戶端的憑證必須位於目前使用者的"My"憑證存放區。The client's certificates must be located in the current user's "My" certificate store. 不支援透過憑證的用戶端驗證(第 2 版 SSL) 通訊協定。Client authentication via certificates is not supported for the (SSL version 2) protocol. 如果驗證失敗時，您會收到，而是無法再使用。If the authentication fails, you receive a , and the is no longer useable. 您應該關閉這個物件，並移除所有參考，讓它可以收集在記憶體回收行程。You should close this object and remove all references to it so that it can be collected by the garbage collector. 當驗證程序，也稱為 SSL 交握，成功時，建立伺服器 （和 （選擇性） 用戶端） 的身分識別和可以由用戶端和伺服器用來交換訊息。When the authentication process, also known as the SSL handshake, succeeds, the identity of the server (and optionally, the client) is established and the can be used by the client and server to exchange messages. 之前傳送或接收資訊時，用戶端和伺服器應檢查的安全性服務和所提供的層級來判斷通訊協定、 演算法和優勢選取符合其需求的完整性與機密性。Before sending or receiving information, the client and server should check the security services and levels provided by the to determine whether the protocol, algorithms, and strengths selected meet their requirements for integrity and confidentiality. 如果目前的設定不足時，必須先關閉資料流。If the current settings are not sufficient, the stream should be closed. 您可以檢查所提供的安全性服務使用和屬性。You can check the security services provided by the using the and properties. 下表顯示報告用於驗證、 加密和資料簽章的密碼編譯設定的項目。The following table shows the elements that report the cryptographic settings used for authentication, encryption and data signing. |元素Element|成員Members| |-------------|-------------| |用來驗證伺服器和 （選擇性） 用戶端的安全性通訊協定。The security protocol used to authenticate the server and, optionally, the client.|屬性和相關聯列舉型別。The property and the associated enumeration.| |金鑰交換演算法。The key exchange algorithm.|屬性和相關聯列舉型別。The property and the associated enumeration.| |訊息完整性演算法。The message integrity algorithm.|屬性和相關聯列舉型別。The property and the associated enumeration.| |訊息機密性演算法。The message confidentiality algorithm.|屬性和相關聯列舉型別。The property and the associated enumeration.| |選取演算法的優點。The strengths of the selected algorithms.|， ，和屬性。The , , and properties.| 成功驗證之後，您可以傳送資料，使用同步或非同步方法。After a successful authentication, you can send data using the synchronous or asynchronous methods. 您可以接收其資料同步使用或非同步方法。You can receive data using the synchronous or asynchronous methods. 如果您指定以，基礎資料流應該保持開啟狀態，您必須負責完成時關閉資料流中使用它。If you specified to the that the underlying stream should be left open, you are responsible for closing that stream when you are done using it. > [!NOTE] > 如果應用程式會建立物件以一般使用者的認證執行，應用程式不能存取憑證安裝在本機電腦存放區中，除非權限已經明確提供給使用者若要這樣做。If the application that creates the object runs with the credentials of a Normal user, the application will not be able to access certificates installed in the local machine store unless permission has been explicitly given to the user to do so. 假設逾時以及任何其他當其中一個會擲回，從內部資料流將被視為嚴重由其呼叫端。 assumes that a timeout along with any other when one is thrown from the inner stream will be treated as fatal by its caller. 重複使用之後逾時將會傳回記憶體回收執行個體。Reusing a instance after a timeout will return garbage. 應用程式應該和在這些情況下擲回例外狀況。An application should the and throw an exception in these cases. .NET Framework 4.6 包含新的安全性功能會封鎖不安全的加密與雜湊演算法的連線。The .NET Framework 4.6 includes a new security feature that blocks insecure cipher and hashing algorithms for connections. 使用 TLS/SSL 透過例如 HttpClient、 HttpWebRequest、 FTPClient、 SmtpClient、 SslStream 」 等的 Api，並以.NET Framework 4.6 為目標的應用程式預設會取得更安全的行為。Applications using TLS/SSL through APIs such as HttpClient, HttpWebRequest, FTPClient, SmtpClient, SslStream, etc. and targeting .NET Framework 4.6 get the more-secure behavior by default. 開發人員可能想要取消這個行為，以維護與 RC4 服務以其現有 SSL3 服務或 TLS 的互通性。Developers may want to opt out of this behavior in order to maintain interoperability with their existing SSL3 services OR TLS w/ RC4 services. [這篇文章](https://support.microsoft.com/kb/3069494)說明如何修改您的程式碼，讓新的行為會停用。[This article](https://support.microsoft.com/kb/3069494) explains how to modify your code so that the new behavior is disabled. .NET Framework 4.7 新增新的驗證 SslStreams 未指定 TLS 版本，但改為使用 TLS 版本定義中的系統預設值為方法的多載[SCHANNEL](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/aa380123.aspx)。The .NET Framework 4.7 adds new overloads for the methods that authenticate SslStreams that do not specify a TLS version, but instead use the TLS version defined as the system default in [SCHANNEL](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/aa380123.aspx). 在您的應用程式中使用這些方法，以便可以稍後修改預設值為 TLS 版本最佳作法是變更一段時間，而不需要重建並重新部署您的應用程式。Use these methods in your app as a way to be able to later modify the defaults as TLS version best practice changes over time, without the need to rebuild and redeploy your app. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立使用類別與用戶端通訊。The following code example demonstrates creating an that uses the class to communicate with clients. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您指定`true`如`leaveStreamOpen`參數，關閉沒有任何作用`innerStream`串流處理; 您必須明確地關閉`innerStream`當您不再需要它。When you specify `true` for the `leaveStreamOpen` parameter, closing the has no effect on the `innerStream` stream; you must explicitly close `innerStream` when you no longer need it. `userCertificateValidationCallback`代理人`certificateErrors`引數包含通道安全性支援提供者介面 (SSPI) 所傳回的任何 Windows 錯誤碼。The `userCertificateValidationCallback` delegate's `certificateErrors` argument contains any Windows error codes returned by the channel Security Support Provider Interface (SSPI). 叫用之方法的傳回值`userCertificateValidationCallback`委派可讓您判斷驗證是否成功。The return value of the method invoked by the `userCertificateValidationCallback` delegate determines whether authentication succeeds. 安全性通訊協定和密碼編譯演算法已時選取`userCertificateValidationCallback`叫用委派的方法。The security protocol and cryptographic algorithms are already selected when the `userCertificateValidationCallback` delegate's method is invoked. 您可以使用此方法來判斷是否滿足您的應用程式選取密碼編譯演算法和優點。You can use the method to determine whether the selected cryptographic algorithms and strengths are sufficient for your application. 如果不是，這個方法應傳回`false`防止建立。If not, the method should return `false` to prevent the from being created. 如果 encryptionpolicy，組態檔中未指定值預設為如建構的執行個體。If a value is not specified in the configuration file for encryptionpolicy, the defaults to for the instance that is constructed. 使用 Null 編碼器時，需要加密原則設為。The use of the Null cipher is required when the encryption policy is set to . > [!NOTE] > 架構快取的 SSL 工作階段建立時，並嘗試盡可能重複使用快取的工作階段為新的要求。The Framework caches SSL sessions as they are created and attempts to reuse a cached session for a new request, if possible. 當嘗試重複使用的 SSL 工作階段，架構會使用第一個項目（如果有一個），或嘗試重複使用匿名的工作階段，如果是空的。When attempting to reuse an SSL session, the Framework uses the first element of (if there is one), or tries to reuse an anonymous sessions if is empty. > [!NOTE] > SSL 版本 2 通訊協定不支援用戶端憑證。Client certificates are not supported in the SSL version 2 protocol. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立並起始驗證的用戶端部分。The following code example creates an and initiates the client portion of the authentication. invoked. 您可以使用此方法來判斷是否滿足您的應用程式選取密碼編譯演算法和優點。You can use the method to determine whether the selected cryptographic algorithms and strengths are sufficient for your application. 如果不是，這個方法應傳回`false`防止建立。If not, the method should return `false` to prevent the from being created. `userCertificateSelectionCallback`委派在您的應用程式有多個憑證，而且必須以動態方式選擇憑證時相當實用。The `userCertificateSelectionCallback` delegate is useful when your application has multiple certificates and must dynamically choose a certificate. 在"MY"存放區中的憑證會傳遞至委派所叫用的方法。Certificates in the "MY" store are passed to the method invoked by the delegate. 如果 encryptionpolicy，組態檔中未指定值預設為如建構的執行個體。If a value is not specified in the configuration file for encryptionpolicy, the defaults to for the instance （如果有的話），第一個項目，或嘗試重複使用匿名的工作階段，如果 P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ClientCertificates 是空白。When attempting to reuse an SSL session, the Framework uses the first element of remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[sslprotocols-none](~/includes/sslprotocols-none-md.md)] 任何用戶端憑證不用於驗證。 No client certificates are used in the authentication. 在驗證期間，不會檢查憑證撤銷清單。The certificate revocation list is not checked during authentication. 指定的值`targetHost`必須符合伺服器憑證的名稱。The value specified for `targetHost` must match the name on the server's certificate. 當驗證成功時，您必須檢查和屬性，以便判斷哪些安全性服務由。When authentication succeeds, you must check the and properties to determine what security services are used by the . 請檢查屬性來判斷是否發生過相互驗證。Check the property to determine whether mutual authentication occurred. 如果驗證失敗時，您會收到，而這是無法再使用。If the authentication fails, you receive a , and this is no longer useable. 您應該關閉這個物件，並移除所有參考，讓它可以收集在記憶體回收行程。You should close this object and remove all references to it so that it can be collected by the garbage collector.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 驗證正在進行時，此方法的多載不會封鎖。The overloads of this method do not block while authentication is in progress. 若要封鎖等候驗證完成時，使用其中一種方法。To block while waiting for the authentication to complete, use one of the methods.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual IAsyncResult BeginAuthenticateAsServer (System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate serverCertificate, AsyncCallback asyncCallback, object asyncState);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginAuthenticateAsServer(class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate serverCertificate, class System.AsyncCallback asyncCallback, object asyncState) cil managed

public: virtual IAsyncResult ^ BeginAuthenticateAsServer(System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Certificate ^ serverCertificate, AsyncCallback ^ asyncCallback, System::Object ^ asyncState);

param.name: serverCertificate
param.span: X509Certificate 可用來驗證伺服器。

span.span: The X509Certificate used to authenticate the server.

param.name: asyncCallback
param.span: 委派，會於驗證完成時參考要叫用的方法。

span.span: An delegate that references the method to invoke when the authentication is complete.

param.name: asyncState
param.span: 使用者定義物件，包含作業的相關資訊。

span.span: A user-defined object that contains information about the operation.

param.span: 作業完成時，這個物件會傳遞給 asyncCallback 委派。

span.span: This object is passed to the asyncCallback delegate when the operation completes.

summary.span: 由伺服器呼叫以開始非同步作業，驗證用戶端與伺服器連接中的用戶端及 (選擇性地驗證) 伺服器。

span.span: Called by servers to begin an asynchronous operation to authenticate the client and optionally the server in a client-server connection.

returns.span: 物件，指出非同步作業的狀態。

span.span: An object indicating the status of the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[sslprotocols-none](~/includes/sslprotocols-none-md.md)] 在驗證期間，不會檢查憑證撤銷清單。 The certificate revocation list is not checked during authentication. 用戶端不是需要提供憑證進行驗證。The client is not required to provide a certificate for authentication. 完成非同步的驗證作業，藉由呼叫方法。The asynchronous authentication operation must be completed by calling the method. 一般而言，方法由叫用`asyncCallback`委派。Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate. 在作業完成時，這個方法不會封鎖。This method does not block while the operation completes. 若要封鎖直到作業完成為止，使用其中一種方法多載。To block until the operation completes, use one of the method overloads. 如需使用非同步程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[非同步呼叫同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md) 如果您收到，這個是無法再使用。If you receive a , this is no longer useable. 您應該關閉這個物件，並移除所有參考，讓它可以收集在記憶體回收行程。You should close this object and remove all references to it so that it can be collected by the garbage collector.

.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginRead(unsigned int8[] buffer, int32 offset, int32 count, class System.AsyncCallback asyncCallback, object asyncState) cil managed
public: override IAsyncResult ^ BeginRead(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ buffer, int offset, int count, AsyncCallback ^ asyncCallback, System::Object ^ asyncState);

param.name: buffer
param.span: 陣列，接收從資料流中讀取的位元組。

span.span: A array that receives the bytes read from the stream.

param.name: offset
param.span: 「緩衝區」中以零為起始的位置，用來開始儲存從此資料流讀取的資料。

span.span: The zero-based location in buffer at which to begin storing the data read from this stream.

param.name: count
param.span: 自資料流中讀取的最大位元組數。

span.span: The maximum number of bytes to read from the stream.

param.name: asyncCallback
param.span: 委派，其會參考讀取作業完成時要叫用的方法。

span.span: An delegate that references the method to invoke when the read operation is complete.

param.name: asyncState
param.span: 包含讀取作業資訊的使用者定義物件。

span.span: A user-defined object that contains information about the read operation.

param.span: 作業完成時，這個物件會傳遞給 asyncCallback 委派。

span.span: This object is passed to the asyncCallback delegate when the operation completes.

summary.span: 開始非同步讀取作業，這個作業會從資料流中讀取資料並將其儲存於指定的陣列中。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous read operation that reads data from the stream and stores it in the specified array.

returns.span: 物件，表示非同步作業的狀態。

span.span: An object that indicates the status of the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已啟用加密，或簽章，讀取的作業會從基礎資料流讀取資料、 檢查資料完整性及/或加以解密。If encryption and or signing are enabled, the read operation reads the data from the underlying stream, checks the integrity of the data, and/or decrypts it. 非同步讀取的作業必須完成呼叫方法。The asynchronous read operation must be completed by calling the method. 一般而言，方法由叫用`asyncCallback`委派。Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate. 在作業完成時，這個方法不會封鎖。This method does not block while the operation completes. 若要封鎖的作業完成之前，請使用方法。To block until the operation completes, use the method. 如需使用非同步程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[非同步呼叫同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md) 類別不支援多個同時進行讀取作業。The class does not support multiple simultaneous read operations. 已成功驗證之前，無法呼叫此方法。You cannot call this method until you have successfully authenticated. 若要驗證的呼叫其中，或， ，方法。To authenticate call one of the , or , , methods. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何開始非同步的讀取的作業。The following code example demonstrates starting an asynchronous read operation. [!code-cpp[NclSslClientAsync#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclSslClientAsync/CPP/NclSslClientAsync.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[NclSslClientAsync#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclSslClientAsync/CS/clientasync.cs#8)] [!code-cpp[NclSslClientAsync#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclSslClientAsync/CPP/NclSslClientAsync.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[NclSslClientAsync#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclSslClientAsync/CS/clientasync.cs#4)] 在讀取完成時，會呼叫下列方法。The following method is called when the read completes. [!code-cpp[NclSslClientAsync#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclSslClientAsync/CPP/NclSslClientAsync.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[NclSslClientAsync#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclSslClientAsync/CS/clientasync.cs#5)]
